title: Yellow Brick Roadies
subtle: Adventure (fiction), 2,171 words, Level U (Grade 4), Lexile 640L, Fiction Series
description: Yellow Brick Roadies recounts another adventure for Miguel as he dives into one of the Great Gallardo's books. This time, as he travels into the Land of Oz with two of his friends, they become the lion, the tin woodsman, and the scarecrow. Together they must work to help Dorothy get to the wizard of Oz, and Miguel must find the courage to stand up to his friends and assert what he knows to be right. Illustrations support the text.
highFrequencyWords: contraption, cowered, furrowed, gorge, looming, mission, Oz, ranting, regal, resourceful, toxic, winced
